H0.text: Inches, grams, ounces are the group that contains only metric measurements.

H1.text: Inches, pounds, ounces is a group of measurement units that does not contain only metric measurements, as the question asks for a group that contains only metric measurements.

H2.text: Centimeters, grams, milliliters are the group that contains only metric measurements.

H3.text: Centimeters, pounds, milliliters is the group that contains only metric measurements.

A4.text: The unit of mass should be the gram or a decimal multiple of it.

A5.text: The centimetre–gram–second system of units (CGS) was the first coherent metric system, having been developed in the 1860s and promoted by James Clerk Maxwell and Lord Kelvin.
